Paragraph.Text: Uses Freezon Canisters to make Plasma-Imbued Missiles have a slowing effect and slightly higher damage.
This machine requires hoppers holding at least 1 Freezon Canister and Plasma-Imbued Missile to start the chilling process.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Temps de Fabrication: Energie Requise: Capacité Energie: Max. Taux de Recharge:
